activities: MINDBODY, Inc. provides a suite of web-based and mobile application products designed to help business owners in the health, wellness and beauty industries manage their day-to-day administrative needs. At the core of these products is MINDBODY’s Business Management Software, a subscription service that includes class and appointment scheduling, point of sale, client management, reporting and marketing features. Our customers' databases contain private and financial information about their businesses (SUBSCRIBERS) and their clients (CONSUMERS). That information is hosted within secure databases on virtual servers located in co-location facilities in Irvine, California and Las Vegas, Nevada.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
